parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the instance endpoint. Valid values:

*   `true`: enables the instance endpoint.
*   `false`: disables the instance endpoint

parameters.name: EndpointType
parameters.description: The type of the endpoint. Set the value to Internet.

parameters.name: ModuleName
parameters.description:
The name of the module that you want to access. Valid values:

*   `Registry`: the image repository.
*   `Chart`: a Helm chart.
